gremlin:AggressiveDefense.NAME: Aggressive Defense
gremlin:AggressiveDefense.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain Block this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

gremlin:ArmsTheft.NAME: Arms Theft
gremlin:ArmsTheft.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Apply !DM! Weak. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:ArmsTheft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Apply !DM! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Astound.NAME: Astound
gremlin:Astound.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have !M! or more gremlin:Wiz, gain a *Ward.
gremlin:Astound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have !M! or more gremlin:Wiz, gain !M! Upgraded *Ward.

gremlin:Bang.NAME: Bang
gremlin:Bang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Add a *Whiz to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Bang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Add a *Whiz+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Bellow.NAME: Bellow
gremlin:Bellow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength for each enemy that does not intend to Attack. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:BrokenShin.NAME: Broken Shin
gremlin:BrokenShin.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply gremlin:Agony. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:BubbleBarrier.NAME: Bubble Barrier
gremlin:BubbleBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Block.

gremlin:BulkUp.NAME: Bulk Up
gremlin:BulkUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Temp_HP. NL gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:BurlyBlow.NAME: Burly Blow
gremlin:BurlyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increased by !M! for each stack of Weak on enemy.

gremlin:CongaLine.NAME: Conga Line
gremlin:CongaLine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin.
gremlin:CongaLine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:CounterStrike.NAME: Counter Strike
gremlin:CounterStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Shivs.
gremlin:CounterStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Upgraded Shivs.

gremlin:CowerChoiceB.NAME: Cower
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Good. Now the rest of you, scram!

gremlin:DaggerDance.NAME: Dagger Dance
gremlin:DaggerDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

gremlin:Dazzle.NAME: Dazzle
gremlin:Dazzle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !DM! or more *Wiz, gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

gremlin:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
gremlin:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Echoes of an Attack in your hand. They cost 1 less. Exhaust.
gremlin:Duplicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Echoes of an Attack in your hand. They cost 1 less.

gremlin:EdibleArmor.NAME: Scrap Armor
gremlin:EdibleArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !DM! gremlin:Temp_HP. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Encore.NAME: Encore
gremlin:Encore.DESCRIPTION: Gain !DM! gremlin:Wiz. NL Whenever you consume gremlin:Wiz, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

gremlin:Enthusiasm.NAME: Enthusiasm
gremlin:Enthusiasm.DESCRIPTION: First time you *Swap each turn, draw a card.
gremlin:Enthusiasm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL First time you *Swap each turn, draw a card.

gremlin:Erupt.NAME: Erupt
gremlin:Erupt.DESCRIPTION: Draw !DM! cards. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Exacerbate.NAME: Exacerbate
gremlin:Exacerbate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. gremlin:Cripple the enemy. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:FairyDust.NAME: Fairy Dust
gremlin:FairyDust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Wards and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:FeelTheAudience.NAME: Feel The Audience
gremlin:FeelTheAudience.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! gremlin:Wiz for each one that intends to attack.

gremlin:FightChoice.NAME: Fight
gremlin:FightChoice.DESCRIPTION: Start Combat. NL Enemy gains !M! Strength.

gremlin:FlipOut.NAME: Flip Out
gremlin:FlipOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Damage increased by your Block.

gremlin:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
gremlin:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:FollowThrough.NAME: For The Leader!
gremlin:FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength.

gremlin:Fury.NAME: Fury
gremlin:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Reduce a cost of a random Attack in your hand to 0 this turn.

gremlin:GlitterGuard.NAME: Glitter Guard
gremlin:GlitterGuard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL When draw, gain a *Ward.
gremlin:GlitterGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL When draw, gain an Upgraded *Ward.

gremlin:GremlinArms.NAME: Gremlin Arms
gremlin:GremlinArms.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random assortment of !M! Shivs and *Wards.

gremlin:GremlinDance.NAME: Gremlin Dance
gremlin:GremlinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Has a bonus effect based on which Gremlin you are.

gremlin:GremlinOffensive.NAME: Gremlin Offensive
gremlin:GremlinOffensive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this to your hand.
gremlin:GremlinOffensive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this to your hand.

gremlin:GremlinToss.NAME: Gremlin Toss
gremlin:GremlinToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Block and gremlin:Temp_HP.
gremlin:GremlinToss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Temp_HP. NL Deal damage equal to your current Block and gremlin:Temp_HP.

gremlin:Heckle.NAME: Heckle
gremlin:Heckle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block.

gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.NAME: Infinite Blocks
gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a *Ward.
gremlin:InfiniteBlocks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain a *Ward.

gremlin:IrksomeBlow.NAME: Irksome Blow
gremlin:IrksomeBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

gremlin:Irritability.NAME: Irritability
gremlin:Irritability.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns. NL gremlin:Swap to gremlin:Mad_Gremlin.

gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.NAME: Makeshift Armor
gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 7 attacks, gain 1 Artifact.
gremlin:MakeshiftArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Every time you play 7 attacks, gain 1 Artifact.

gremlin:Mockery.NAME: Mockery
gremlin:Mockery.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy has 3 or more Weak, gain !B! Block.

gremlin:Necromancy.NAME: Necromancy
gremlin:Necromancy.DESCRIPTION: Requires !DM! gremlin:Wiz. NL Consume all gremlin:Wiz to resurrect a random Gremlin with !M! HP. Exhaust.

gremlin:Nob.NAME: NOB
gremlin:Nob.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Temp_HP. NL Mutate into *Gremlin gremlin:Nob until you run out of *Temp *HP.

gremlin:PartyStick.NAME: Party Stick
gremlin:PartyStick.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:PartyStick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nobody is allowed to play with the Party Stick.

gremlin:Patsy.NAME: Patsy
gremlin:Patsy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When drawn, gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:Pickpocket.NAME: Pickpocket
gremlin:Pickpocket.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:PinNeedle.NAME: Pin Needle
gremlin:PinNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert !M! *Pinpricks. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:PinNeedle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Insert !M! Upgraded *Pinpricks. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Pinprick.NAME: Pinprick
gremlin:Pinprick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Pinprick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When drawn, gain an gremlin:Echo of this. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Polish.NAME: Polish
gremlin:Polish.DESCRIPTION: Shivs deal !M! additional damage. NL *Wards grant !M! additional Block.

gremlin:PourSalt.NAME: Pour Salt
gremlin:PourSalt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is *Weak, gain [E] .

gremlin:Pretaliation.NAME: Pretaliation
gremlin:Pretaliation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns.

gremlin:ProperTools.NAME: Proper Tools
gremlin:ProperTools.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! *Wards. Otherwise, gain !M! Shivs.

gremlin:RageBreak.NAME: Rage Break
gremlin:RageBreak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL When drawn, NL gain !DM! gremlin:Temp_HP.
gremlin:RageBreak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Double your Strength. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Raid.NAME: Raid
gremlin:Raid.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each living Gremlin. NL Discard !M! cards.
gremlin:Raid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each living Gremlin. NL Discard !M! cards.

gremlin:Revel.NAME: Revel
gremlin:Revel.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL Gain [E] .
gremlin:Revel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw a card and gain [E] .

gremlin:Rhythm.NAME: Rhythm
gremlin:Rhythm.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw pile. NL gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Rhythm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your draw pile. NL gremlin:Swap to the next Gremlin.

gremlin:Rush.NAME: Rush
gremlin:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Scatter.NAME: Scatter!
gremlin:Scatter.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would lose HP, instead gremlin:Swap to a random Gremlin. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:SecondVolley.NAME: Second Volley
gremlin:SecondVolley.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain a Shiv for each card played this turn.
gremlin:SecondVolley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain an Upgraded Shiv for each card played this turn.

gremlin:ShadowShiv.NAME: Shadow Shiv
gremlin:ShadowShiv.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack that doesn't Exhaust, gain a Shiv.

gremlin:ShankStone.NAME: Shank Stone
gremlin:ShankStone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shiv. NL When drawn, gain a Shiv.
gremlin:ShankStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shivs. NL When drawn, gain a Shiv.

gremlin:SharpenBlades.NAME: Sharpen Blades
gremlin:SharpenBlades.DESCRIPTION: Increase damage of ALL Attacks in your hand by !M! for the rest of combat.

gremlin:ShowOfHands.NAME: Show of Hands
gremlin:ShowOfHands.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for every card in your hand.
gremlin:ShowOfHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Block for every card in your hand.

gremlin:ShowStopper.NAME: Show Stopper
gremlin:ShowStopper.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have exactly !DM! gremlin:Wiz. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

gremlin:SleeveOfAces.NAME: Sleeve Of Aces
gremlin:SleeveOfAces.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Shiv for each stack of gremlin:Wiz you have.
gremlin:SleeveOfAces.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Upgraded Shiv for each stack of gremlin:Wiz you have.

gremlin:SkullBash.NAME: Skull Bash
gremlin:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Stupend.NAME: Stupend
gremlin:Stupend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !M! or more *Wiz, gain !B! Block.

gremlin:SupplyScrollCard.NAME: Supply Scroll
gremlin:SupplyScrollCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random assortment of !M! Shivs and *Wards. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Tadah.NAME: Tadah!
gremlin:Tadah.DESCRIPTION: Gain an gremlin:Echo of a random Skill. NL gremlin:Swap to gremlin:Gremlin_Wizard.
gremlin:Tadah.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain an gremlin:Echo of a random Skill. It costs 1 less. NL gremlin:Swap to gremlin:Gremlin_Wizard.

gremlin:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
gremlin:TagTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL gremlin:Swap to a living Gremlin of your choice.

gremlin:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Wounds
gremlin:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! additional damage to Weakened enemies.

gremlin:ToeStub.NAME: Toe Stub
gremlin:ToeStub.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !DM! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

gremlin:Tricksy.NAME: Tricksy
gremlin:Tricksy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then discard any that are not Attacks.

gremlin:TwistTheKnife.NAME: Twist The Knife
gremlin:TwistTheKnife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Upgraded Shiv.

gremlin:Whiz.NAME: Whiz
gremlin:Whiz.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Wiz. Next turn, gain a *Bang. NL Exhaust.
gremlin:Whiz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gremlin:Wiz. Next turn, gain an Upgraded *Bang. NL Exhaust.

gremlin:Wizardry.NAME: Wizardry
gremlin:Wizardry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !DM! gremlin:Wiz. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! gremlin:Wiz.
gremlin:Wizardry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! gremlin:Wiz.
